A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: One of the best movie-going experiences I have ever had. It made me believe in not only the emotive power of visual storytelling but the importance of going to the cinema and sharing with so many others something truly remarkable. Thank you Rian Johnson for taking the helm of this film. You have breathed new life into the series. It was something like magic - inventive\, hysterical\, unexpected\, and simply beautiful. I am thrilled to see what is to come with your own trilogy. Well done and good luck.
